name: CEVA Santé Animale
membership: Ceva Santé Animale is member of AnimalHealth Europe (formerly IFAH-Europe)
goal: Ceva Santé Animale discovers, develops, manufactures and markets veterinary vaccines and medicines globally, supported by technical services. Ceva serves veterinarians and animal owners.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: Delegated and implementing acts resulting from the regulation on Veterinay medicinal products and the regulation on the manufacture, placing on the market and use of medicated feed; EU Animal welfare policy; Animal health Policy; Trade Policy; Antibiotic resistance initiatives. Alternative to Antibiotics.
